channel.title: Dialoguehandler won't work? Making npc's talk through chat
channel.description:
alright when i add a dialogue and change the case: npc name
it does't work!!! i click to talk and it doesnt even talk!!?@! help? i also compile and put him in spawn-config, im using trisidiax
